question: Which state is to observe 'COVID-19 - No Tolerance Fortnight', to fight Covid-19?
explanation:
The state government of Mizoram has decided to observe 'COVID-19 - No Tolerance Fortnight' beginning from 26th October.
The Health & Family Welfare Minister of the state said that this measure would be a containment measure to flatten the curve of Covid-19 in the state. All unlock guidelines and SOPs would be followed strictly.
